meanings.definition: Relating to the effect of solute particles on the properties of a solvent.
meanings.sent1: The colligative changes in the water made it freeze faster.
meanings.sent2: The colligative properties of the salt solution affected its boiling point.
meanings.sent3: The colligative impact of the sugar in the tea made it taste sweeter.
meanings.sent4: The colligative nature of the salt altered the behavior of the water.
meanings.sent5: The colligative influence of the particles was evident in the solution's behavior.

meanings.definition: Involving the collective behavior of solute particles in a solution.
meanings.sent1: The colligative interactions between the particles led to a change in the solution.
meanings.sent2: The colligative nature of the particles affected the overall solution.
meanings.sent3: The colligative behavior of the solute particles created an interesting pattern.
meanings.sent4: The colligative dynamics of the particles influenced the solution's properties.
meanings.sent5: The colligative process of the particles working together was fascinating to observe.
